name: ascend (itch) (dungky)
description:
Description:

Ascend is a quick platformer where the character climbs up a map.  Jump over obstacles and bounce on walls to reach the end! This is my first time making a game in pico 8, and it was a very unique experience. Because of this, there are many bugs and rough edges that need fixing.

Controls:

Arrow keys are used to move the character around, the "x" key is used for jumping, and the "z" key is used for wall bouncing.
